languages.text: {n}Данрок переводит взгляд на израненных пленных.{/n} "Впрочем, как вы видите, и среди врагов наших сплошь те, кто еще недавно вам присягал. Члены команды, поддавшиеся на пропаганду мятежников. Вы вольны лично вынести им приговор, либо же доверить экзекуцию мне, после того как отбудете по делам".

{n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."
languages.original_text: {n}Данрок переводит взгляд на израненных пленных.{/n} "Впрочем, как вы видите, и среди врагов наших сплошь те, кто еще недавно вам присягал. Члены команды, поддавшиеся на пропаганду мятежников. Вы вольны лично вынести им приговор, либо же доверить экзекуцию мне, после того как отбудете по делам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok shifts his gaze to the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies are also made up of those who swore an oath to you not so long ago. The members of the crew who had succumbed to the rebel propaganda. You are at liberty to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have left on business."

{n}Danrok shifts his gaze to the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies are also made up of those who swore an oath to you not so long ago. The members of the crew who had succumbed to the rebel propaganda. You are at liberty to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have left on business."

It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

{n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

{n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

languages.text: {n}Danrok mira de reojo a los prisioneros heridos.{/n} «Aun así, como ve, nuestros enemigos también incluyen a aquellos que prestaron juramento recientemente: miembros de la tripulación que se dejaron convencer por la propaganda rebelde. Puede decidir sentenciarlos usted mism{mf|o|a} o dejar la ejecución en mis manos cuando se marche».
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok mira de reojo a los prisioneros heridos.{/n} «Aun así, como ve, nuestros enemigos también incluyen a aquellos que prestaron juramento recientemente: miembros de la tripulación que se dejaron convencer por la propaganda rebelde. Puede decidir sentenciarlos usted mism{mf|o|a} o dejar la ejecución en mis manos cuando se marche».

languages.text: {n}ダンロックは、負傷した囚人たちをチラリと見る。{/n}「見てのとおり、我々の敵には少し前にあなたに誓いを立てた者たちも加わっています…反乱軍のプロパガンダに騙されたクルーですよ。あなた自ら処刑するのか、それともあなたが出かけた後に、私に処刑を任せるのかは、陛下が決めてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

traits.locale_text: {n}ダンロックは、負傷した囚人たちをチラリと見る。{/n}「見てのとおり、我々の敵には少し前にあなたに誓いを立てた者たちも加わっています…反乱軍のプロパガンダに騙されたクルーですよ。あなた自ら処刑するのか、それともあなたが出かけた後に、私に処刑を任せるのかは、陛下が決めてください」

languages.text: {n}丹罗克瞥了一眼受伤的众多犯人。{/n}“不过，正如您所见，我们的敌人还包括那些不久前刚刚对您宣誓效忠的人，这些船员听信了叛军的宣传。您是打算亲自处决他们，还是希望等您离开之后由我来执行死刑？这个决定由您来定。”
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

traits.locale_text: {n}丹罗克瞥了一眼受伤的众多犯人。{/n}“不过，正如您所见，我们的敌人还包括那些不久前刚刚对您宣誓效忠的人，这些船员听信了叛军的宣传。您是打算亲自处决他们，还是希望等您离开之后由我来执行死刑？这个决定由您来定。”

languages.text: {n}Danrok blickt zu den verwundeten Gefangenen.{/n} "Und doch, wie Ihr sehen könnt, zählen zu unseren Feinden auch jene, die Euch vor gar nicht langer Zeit einen Eid geschworen haben — Crewmitglieder, die auf die Propaganda der Rebellen hereingefallen sind. Es ist Eure Entscheidung, ob Ihr sie selbst verurteilen möchtet oder die Hinrichtung mir überlassen, nachdem Ihr Euch verabschiedet habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok blickt zu den verwundeten Gefangenen.{/n} "Und doch, wie Ihr sehen könnt, zählen zu unseren Feinden auch jene, die Euch vor gar nicht langer Zeit einen Eid geschworen haben — Crewmitglieder, die auf die Propaganda der Rebellen hereingefallen sind. Es ist Eure Entscheidung, ob Ihr sie selbst verurteilen möchtet oder die Hinrichtung mir überlassen, nachdem Ihr Euch verabschiedet habt."

languages.text: {n}Danrok lance un regard en direction des prisonniers blessés.{/n} « Pourtant, comme vous pouvez le constater, nos ennemis comptent également dans leurs rangs ceux qui vous ont prêté serment d'allégeance il n'y a pas si longtemps. Ces membres d'équipage ont succombé à la propagande rebelle. Vous êtes libre de les châtier vous-même, ou de me laisser le soin de les faire exécuter après votre départ. »
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok lance un regard en direction des prisonniers blessés.{/n} « Pourtant, comme vous pouvez le constater, nos ennemis comptent également dans leurs rangs ceux qui vous ont prêté serment d'allégeance il n'y a pas si longtemps. Ces membres d'équipage ont succombé à la propagande rebelle. Vous êtes libre de les châtier vous-même, ou de me laisser le soin de les faire exécuter après votre départ. »

languages.text: {n}Danrok, yaralı mahkûmlara bakıyor.{/n} "Lakin gördüğünüz gibi düşmanlarımızın arasında size pek yakında bağlılık yemini etmiş olanlar da var. İsyancı propagandasına kanmış tayfalar. Onları bizzat cezalandırabilir yahut işlerinizle ilgilenmek üzere ayrıldığınızda infazlarını bana bırakabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok glances at the wounded prisoners.{/n} "Yet, as you can see, our enemies also include those who swore an oath to you not so long ago — crew members who fell for the rebel propaganda. It is your choice whether to sentence them yourself, or to leave the execution to me after you have departed on your business."
